name: VTK: Revenge
description:
Johnny has been woke, now is the time for revenge. This time, he has one goal in mind, the key to the gates of freedom. However, his new opponents are on another level compared to VShogen: the Legends. Fight your way to victory or lose it all in defeat.

Controls

  • WASD to move player
  • Z for shooting and reloading
  • X for Swinging and Reflect
  • Esc for pause
